Suno.title: Suno AI Downloader
Suno.description: The fastest way to download Suno.ai MP3s.
Suno.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid Suno.com song URL
Suno.error: Failed to fetch song data. Please check the URL.

guide.title: How to use
guide.step1: Copy the song or playlist link from Suno.ai or Mureka.ai.
guide.step2: Paste it into the input box above and click 'Resolve'.
guide.step3: Click 'Download' in the results list to save the MP3.

JwtDebugger.title: JWT Debugger

VideoConverter.title: Video Editor & Converter
VideoConverter.description: Convert, trim, and extract audio from videos locally in your browser using WASM.
VideoConverter.inputPlaceholder: Drag & drop video file or click to upload

SvgToJsx.pasteSvg: Paste your raw SVG code here
SvgToJsx.whyUseDesc: Web standards for SVG attributes are often kebab-case (e.g., stroke-width), but React components require camelCase (e.g., strokeWidth). Manually converting complex SVGs is tedious and error-prone. Our tool handles attribute mapping, removes overhead, and wraps it in a functional component structure so you can just paste it and go.

RegexTester.title: RegEx Tester
RegexTester.description: Real-time regular expression testing with highlighting.

CronGenerator.title: Cron Expression Generator
CronGenerator.description: Create and understand cron schedules easily.
CronGenerator.enterValidCron: Enter a valid cron expression to see upcoming runs.

MyIp.ipDesc: Your public IP address and network details
MyIp.privacyDesc: We do not store or sell your IP data. This information is fetched in real time.

BannerGenerator.checkConsole: If this keeps happening, check the console for details.
BannerGenerator.springBootDesc: Use this ASCII art in your Spring Boot banner.txt.

QrGenerator.title: QR Code Generator
QrGenerator.description: Create customizable QR codes with colors, sizes, and error correction levels. Download as PNG or SVG.
QrGenerator.higherLevelsNote: Higher levels handle more damage but reduce capacity.

BackgroundRemover.title: AI Background Remover
BackgroundRemover.description: Instantly remove backgrounds from images using sophisticated AI. 100% private and locally processed in your browser.
BackgroundRemover.inputPlaceholder: Drop an image here to remove the background
BackgroundRemover.poweredBy: Powered by AI (U-2-Net). Processing happens locally for 100% privacy.
BackgroundRemover.howItWorksDescription: This tool uses the U-2-Net deep learning model running directly in your browser via WebAssembly. It identifies the subject and creates a precise mask to remove the background instantly.
BackgroundRemover.privacyDescription: Unlike other online tools, your photos are processed entirely on your device. We never see, store, or upload your images. It works even when offline!

Base64Converter.title: Base64 Encoder/Decoder
Base64Converter.description: Convert between text and Base64 in real-time with clipboard support.

UrlConverter.encodePlaceholder: Type URL or text to encode...
UrlConverter.decodePlaceholder: Paste URL encoded string to decode...

HashGenerator.title: Hash Generator
HashGenerator.description: Generate MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, and SHA-512 hashes in real-time.

ImageCompressor.title: Image Compressor
ImageCompressor.description: Reduce image size while maintaining quality directly in your browser.
ImageCompressor.introDesc: Upload a PNG/JPG/WEBP and tune quality or scale. You'll see the estimated size savings and can download the compressed result.
ImageCompressor.errorInvalidFile: Invalid file type. Please upload an image.

BrowserInfo.title: What is my Browser?
BrowserInfo.description: Analyze your browser version, OS, screen resolution, and user agent details.
BrowserInfo.environmentReport: Comprehensive report of your current environment
BrowserInfo.hardwareThreadsDesc: CPU logical cores reported by the browser
BrowserInfo.note: Note: These values are extracted directly from your browser's navigator object and are not stored elsewhere.

SpeedTest.title: Network Speed Test
SpeedTest.description: Measure your download, upload, and latency in real time.
SpeedTest.readyDesc: Start the test to measure download, upload, and latency.
SpeedTest.testingMethodologyDesc: Download uses a large file from Cloudflare. Upload sends a fixed payload to estimate throughput.
SpeedTest.jitterDesc: Jitter is variation in latency over time, which affects real-time calls and gaming.
SpeedTest.fiberVs5gDesc: Fiber usually offers lower latency and more stable speeds. 5G can be fast but more variable.

SqlFormatter.title: SQL Formatter
SqlFormatter.description: Format and beautify your complex SQL queries with multiple dialect support.
SqlFormatter.errorMessage: Format failed. Please check your SQL syntax.

XmlFormatter.validationDesc: Automatically validates XML structure and reports syntax errors with detailed error messages.
XmlFormatter.formattingDesc: Beautifies XML with proper indentation and line breaks for improved readability.
XmlFormatter.conversionDesc: Converts XML to JSON format while preserving attributes and nested structures.

YoutubeThumbnail.title: YouTube Thumbnail Extractor
YoutubeThumbnail.description: Get high-quality thumbnails from any YouTube video URL.
YoutubeThumbnail.errorInvalidUrl: Invalid YouTube URL. Please check and try again.
YoutubeThumbnail.guideDescription: Paste a YouTube URL and click extract to get thumbnails in multiple resolutions.
YoutubeThumbnail.tipsDescription: Some videos don’t provide a max-resolution image. Use high/medium quality in that case.

BoxShadowGenerator.title: CSS Box Shadow Generator
BoxShadowGenerator.description: Create beautiful, multi-layered box shadows visually.

Base64Image.pasteDataUri: Paste your data URI or raw string
Base64Image.invalidBase64: Invalid Base64 string. Please ensure it follows correct format.
Base64Image.noteDesc: Data URIs often include specific mime-types (like image/webp). If your string doesn't include header, we'll attempt to render it as a standard PNG by default.

GradientGenerator.description: Create stunning linear, radial, and conic gradients.
GradientGenerator.minStopsError: A gradient needs at least 2 colors.

HwpViewer.copyInfo: You can select and copy text from the viewer.
HwpViewer.hwpDisabled: HWP Viewer is temporarily disabled due to build issues.

Basic3dViewer.description: Preview OBJ, STL, and GLTF/GLB files interactively using Three.js.

BcryptGenerator.title: Bcrypt Generator
BcryptGenerator.description: Generate and verify Bcrypt password hashes securely.
BcryptGenerator.generateDesc: Create a secure Bcrypt hash from a password.
BcryptGenerator.roundsDesc: Higher is slower but more secure
BcryptGenerator.verifyDesc: Check if a password matches a Bcrypt hash.
BcryptGenerator.errorVerifyEmpty: Please enter both password and hash

HmacGenerator.title: HMAC Generator
HmacGenerator.description: Create Hash-based Message Authentication Codes using a secret key.
HmacGenerator.errorEmpty: Please enter both secret and message

RsaGenerator.title: RSA Key Generator
RsaGenerator.description: Generate RSA Public and Private Key pairs locally.

AesCrypto.title: AES Encryption & Decryption
AesCrypto.description: Protect your sensitive data with military-grade AES-GCM encryption. All processing happens locally in your browser—your data never leaves your device.
AesCrypto.securityNote: This tool uses Web Crypto API (AES-GCM) with PBKDF2 for key derivation. Every encryption generates a unique Salt and IV.
AesCrypto.encryptError: Encryption failed. Please check your inputs.
AesCrypto.decryptError: Decryption failed. Incorrect password or corrupted data.

DataTools.description: Convert, format, and clean data with JSON, SQL, and slug tools.

JsonConverter.errorEmpty: Please upload a file or enter text

SlugGenerator.inputPlaceholder: Enter text to slugify (e.g. My Blog Post Title)

TextTools.description: OCR, lorem ipsum generator, and Korean text utilities in one place.

KTools.description: Korean document viewing, Hangul utilities, and local validation tools.

DockerConverter.errorEmpty: Please enter a docker run command

BusinessValidator.resWarning: This tool only checks format/checksum validity. It does not verify actual identity.

TorrentHistory.title: Torrent History Check
TorrentHistory.description: Scan your IP address for public torrent download history and security risks.
TorrentHistory.subtitle: See what traces your IP address has left on the public BitTorrent network. This tool queries public DHT databases.
TorrentHistory.notice: * We query public databases. No history is stored.

results.cleanDesc: We couldn't find any torrent activity associated with this IP address in the public databases.
results.cleanWarning: ⚠️ However, dynamic IPs change frequently, so check regularly.
results.vpnDetected: VPN usage detected! You are successfully hiding your location.
results.blockedDesc: Automated scan was blocked by security policy. Please check manually below.

analysis.subnetDesc: Simulated: Metadata queries indicate activity in compatible subnets.

guide.title: Privacy Protection Guide
whyVpnList: Hides your real IP address from public swarms.
Encrypts your traffic from ISP monitoring.
guide.policyDesc: This tool processes data in RAM only. No logs are saved. Your search history disappears when you close this tab.

disclaimer.title: Technical Limitations & Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: This tool provides estimated data based on public P2P network DHT (Distributed Hash Table) information. Since most home internet connections (ISPs) use 'Dynamic IPs', the retrieved history might belong to a previous user of this IP address, not necessarily you. This result cannot be used as legal evidence and is for reference purposes only.

PortScanner.title: Port Scanner
PortScanner.description: Scan common ports on a target server to check for open services.
PortScanner.targetDesc: Enter a hostname or IP to scan common services
PortScanner.noScanDesc: Configure a target and press Start Scan to monitor port availability.

legend.openDesc: The service responded and connection was accepted. This usually means an application is listening on this port.
legend.closedDesc: The host responded but explicitly refused connection. No application is currently listening on this port.
legend.filteredDesc: No response was received within the timeout period. This is often caused by a firewall dropping packets.

limitation.title: Note
limitation.content: This tool uses a server-side scanner to check port availability accurately.

ImageConverter.clickOrDrag: Click or drag image to upload
ImageConverter.introDesc: Upload an image and convert it to PNG, JPG, or WebP format. All processing happens locally in your browser—your images never leave your device.
